title: Association for Perioperative Practice
text: The Association for Perioperative Practice (AfPP) is a British professional body for healthcare workers. Its stated aims include "the promotion of high standards of perioperative care, the exchange of professional information between members and co-operation with other professional bodies". It is a registered <a href="Charity%20Commission%20for%20England%20and%20Wales">charity</a>. It was established as the National Association of Theatre Nurses (NATN) in 1964. it claims to have 7,000 members.
